metadata.name: FOUNDERS OPAL
metadata.description:
The Real Mineralogy FOUNDERS OPAL is the foundation of the Real Mineralogy NFT ecosystem.  This artwork by Rendr, serves as an important representation of your recognition, support, and participation in the Real Mineralogy NFT ecosystem.  

This FOUNDERS OPAL may be staked to earn a REAL opal.  Opals vary in variety, grade, style, status, and value.  This claim includes boulder, koroit, welo, fire, and more opal varieties.
